授業目的: The purpose of this course is for students to learn basic knowledge and skills to carry out research in condensed matter physics as independent researchers by working on research on a specific theme.
到達目標:
Students will acquire:
a) the basic skills necessary for independent researchers in condensed matter physics,
b) the ability to obtain academic knowledge independently by conducting research on a specific theme based on their own ideas.
